overview:
Director of Business Development

Checkpoint Technologies is reselling partner of Hewlett-Packard Company that includes software and hardware products. The core business focus is in consulting, staff augmentation, training, services, design and implementation of core business IT solutions. With a combined experience level of more than 30 years in helping clients maximize their investments in technology and software.

Our consultants provide expertise in the areas of quality assurance, software test, application development and system design.
